newsitem.title: CHINA: Strong earthquake detected near central Chile-HK.
newsitem.headline: Strong earthquake detected near central Chile-HK.

text.p: A strong earthquake estimated at 6.5 on the Richter scale was recorded near central Chile, the Hong Kong Observatory said on Sunday.

The epicentre of the quake, detected at 6:14 p.m. Hong Kong time (1014 GMT), was initially determined to be near the coast of central Chile, about 400 kilometres (248 miles) north-northwest of Santiago, Chile at 30.0 S 71.7 W, the Observatory said.
No further information was immediately available.
